name: QxMaven Plugin
tagline: A plugin to build qooxdoo applications with Maven, out of the box
body:
Qooxdoo Maven Plugin is a maven plugin to help people developing Qooxdoo application within Maven.

## Quick start

### Using an archetype
The best way to getting started is to use the [qooxdoo-archetype-desktop](http://salmon-charles.github.com/qooxdoo-archetype-desktop/), which will create a web application with the Qooxdoo build life-cycles mapped to the maven ones.

### From an existing maven project
The simple way is to transform your maven project into a 'qooxdoo' one, by modifying the `pom.xml` file as follow:
```xml
<project>
	
  <packaging>qooxdoo</packaging> <!-- ADD THIS LINE -->

  <build>
    <plugins>
      <!-- QOOXDOO PLUGIN -->
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.qooxdoo</groupId>
        <artifactId>qooxdoo-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>2.0-RC1</version>
        <extensions>true</extensions> <!-- IMPORTANT !!! -->
      </plugin>
    </plugins> 
  </build>
</project>
```

Don't forget the `<packaging>qooxdoo</packaging>` AND `<extensions>true</extensions>`, they are responsible for mapping the Qooxdoo build life-cycles to the Maven ones.

You can now run `mvn compile` to build your project or `mvn test` to run unit tests.
